post_body:
Now that we get 5 stickers per skin, wouldn't it be sick to have souvenir skins with all 5 signatures of one team on them? 

If they wanted to make some more rare than others, maybe the 10 signature stickers per match could be applied randomly, so that only some souvenir skins have all stickers of the same team, while most have a mix of the two.

If valve doesn't do this, the teams should totally do it themselves: do giveaways with skins that have all the teams signatures on it, each sticker personally applied by the player. That way, it'd be as if the player ACTUALLY signed the gun.
